column9:
Anthony Brennan, the human, has roamed the swamp for over 336 years. 
Gifted with fire breath, shape-shifting, they strike fear into the hearts of adventurers. 
However, they are vulnerable to sunlight. 
Legends say that Anthony Brennan was once a guardian of the realm of Mejiaberg, twisted by betrayal and dark magic 
after the fateful event on 2023-01-31. 
Now, they haunt the shadows, waiting for the day when they can reclaim their lost honor.
